# Ministry of Regional Development (Czech Republic)

|employees       =
|budget          =
|chief1_name     = Petr Kulh√°nek
|chief1_position = Minister of Regional Development
|website         = https://mmr.gov.cz/
|footnotes       =
}}
The Ministry of Regional Development of the Czech Republic () is a government ministry, which was established in 1996 and is a central government authority in the following areas: Regional policy, Housing policy, Development of housing stock, Letting of flats and non-residential premises, Spatial planning, Building rules, Expropriation, Investment policy, Tourism and Funeral services.
